visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object that renders a column chart with the title 'Monthly Sales Data'. The x-axis should have categories for each month from January to December. The y-axis should display the sales data for each month. The chart should have a custom color palette and include a legend. The title should be styled with a larger font size and a specific color. The axes labels should also have a specific font size and color. The chart should have a white background and a margin of 50 pixels on all sides.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a column chart with a title 'Monthly Sales Data'. The chart type is set to 'column', and it includes a white background with a margin of 50 pixels on all sides. The title is styled with a larger font size and a dark gray color. The x-axis displays categories for each month from January to December, with labels styled in a smaller font size and a medium gray color. The y-axis is labeled 'Sales' with a slightly larger font size and medium gray color. The data series represents monthly sales data with a custom color of teal. The legend is enabled and styled with a smaller font size and medium gray color. Additionally, an export button is included with the text 'Export'.
